doc.title: Gorilla Warfare: The Making of 'White Bitch Down'
doc.plot: What does it take to write, shoot, and edit a short film in a 48 hour time period? 'Gorilla Warfare' is a behind the scenes documentary of just that! When the 48 Hour Film Project rolled into Atlanta in June 2002, The Boondogglers team set out to complete their project and win! Their finished product was called 'White Bitch Down.' Interviews with the director, producer and others narrate what happened in their weekend.
